member.summary: Gets the list of subfolders for the specified folder.

member.summary: Gets the root folder of the current Portal.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.DigitalAssets.Components.Controllers.IDigitalAssetsController.GetFolderContent(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the files and folders contained in the specified folder.
member.param: Folder Identifier
Start index to retrieve items
Max Number of items
The sort expression in a SQL format, e.g. FileName ASC
member.returns: The list of files and folders contained in the specified folder paginated

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.DigitalAssets.Components.Controllers.IDigitalAssetsController.SearchFolderContent(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Searches the files and folders contained in the specified folder.
member.param: Folder Identifier
The pattern to search for
Start index to retrieve items
Max Number of items
The sort expression in a SQL format, e.g. FileName ASC
member.returns: The list of files and folders contained in the specified folder paginated

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.DigitalAssets.Components.Controllers.IDigitalAssetsController.SyncFolderContent(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Synchronize a folder within the File System
member.param: Reference to the folder is going to be synchronized
Indicates if subfolders are going to be synchronized

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.DigitalAssets.Components.Controllers.IDigitalAssetsController.CreateFolder(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.param: folderName is the name of the new folder
The reference to the parent folder where the new folder will be create
folderMappingID is the mapping related with the new folder
mappedPath used for the mapping to folder in remove provider
member.returns: The newly folder created under the specified parent folder
